experience_crm_erp_cms: I actively took part in the development processes of CRM, ERP, and CMS projects.
contribution_to_laravel_backend_modules_: I contributed to the development of modules such as user roles, authorization, data management, e-invoice, and virtual POS integrations in Laravel.
laravel_api_realtime_admin_vue_developme:
I develop RESTful and GraphQL APIs with Laravel and use MongoDB and PostgreSQL in a hybrid structure. I optimize data modeling and management with Eloquent ORM.
 With Laravel Reverb, I build WebSocket-based real-time systems, taking an active role especially in live data flows such as chat and notifications.
 I develop modern and user-friendly admin panels with Laravel Blade and design interactive interfaces with Vue.js.
kotlin_project_experience: I gained experience in the software development environment by building projects using the Kotlin programming language.

about_page.intro: Hello, I'm Mert MÃ¼stehlik. I started my software career by developing CRM, ERP, and corporate web projects in my early years. During this process, I gained strong foundations in role-based authorization, data flows, integrations, and corporate business processes. I also gained experience in frontend development using Laravel Blade and Vue.js, contributing actively to both backend and frontend.
about_page.projects: Over time, I participated in larger and more complex projects, developing RESTful APIs, GraphQL services, high-traffic architectures, and user-focused admin panels. I work with Laravel, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis, and various modern web tools, designing modules end-to-end from analysis to development, optimization, and deployment.
about_page.approach: My working approach is based on clean code, correct architectural decisions, consistent data models, performance-focused solutions, and continuous learning. In every project, I aim to develop sustainable, scalable, and truly valuable software.
about_page.motivation: What motivates me most in software is seeing an idea turn into a real product with code. Witnessing an application making an impact in people's lives brings me joy and drives me to approach the next project with more excitement. Every piece of work I produce strengthens this passion.

contact_page.name: Name
contact_page.message_field_desc: You can write the message you want to send here. I will do my best to respond as soon as possible.
contact_page.success_message: Your message has been sent successfully!
contact_page.error_message: Sorry, your message could not be sent. Please try again.

description: A social media-focused content platform where users can upload videos, host live broadcasts, send Shoot Coin-based gifts, and convert them to cash.

I contributed to the majority of backend processes, excluding live broadcast & PK modules: video uploads, GraphQL API development, creation and purchase of coin packages, gift sending logic, wallet management, admin panel functionalities, and hybrid data modeling (MongoDB + PostgreSQL).
Additionally, I developed the frontend of the web-based admin panel (Laravel Blade), implementing end-to-end design, functionality, and data flow for management screens.

WallTalk is a social chat app where users can communicate via text, audio, and video, with university students able to verify their student email to join their campus groups, and all messages are automatically deleted every night.
I worked on backend development, the admin panel (Laravel Blade), and the web interface using Vue.js.

An application for farm owners to manage their farms and interact with other users. Features include income-expense tracking, crop and livestock management, paid advertisements, job postings, and event sharing.
I developed the RESTful API endpoints and designed and implemented the web-based admin panel using Laravel Blade.
A comprehensive workflow management platform that allows companies to digitalize and manage their business processes.
I contributed to the development and improvement of multiple modules.
An application developed to monitor and automate the operational processes of an English education program for children aged 0-5.
I contributed to the development and improvement of web-based family and admin panels.
An application developed to migrate all internal company operations to a web-based CRM system.

I worked on modules including candidate management, integration of mandatory fields for different candidate groups for CV creation, agency management, and potential customer management, contributing to both development and improvement.
Transformed the provided design drafts into a fully functional website using HTML/CSS, and developed a multilingual, CMS-based product and content management system using PHP.
This was my first professional project where my code was used by real users.

form.bot_spam_alert: Due to bot/spam protection, please wait a few seconds before submitting the form.

validation.after_or_equal: {{attribute}} must be a date equal to or after {{date}}.
validation.alpha_dash: {{attribute}} may only contain letters, numbers, dashes, and underscores.
validation.alpha_num: {{attribute}} may only contain letters and numbers.
validation.email: {{attribute}} must be a valid email address.
validation.ends_with: {{attribute}} must end with one of the following: {{values}}

gte.numeric: {{attribute}} must be greater than or equal to {{value}}.
gte.file: {{attribute}} must be greater than or equal to {{value}} kilobytes.
gte.string: {{attribute}} must be greater than or equal to {{value}} characters.

validation.ip: {{attribute}} must be a valid IP address.
validation.ipv4: {{attribute}} must be a valid IPv4 address.
validation.ipv6: {{attribute}} must be a valid IPv6 address.
validation.json: {{attribute}} must be a valid JSON string.

max.file: {{attribute}} may not be greater than {{max}} kilobytes.
max.string: {{attribute}} may not be greater than {{max}} characters.
max.array: {{attribute}} may not have more than {{max}} items.

password.letters: {{attribute}} must contain at least one letter.
password.mixed: {{attribute}} must contain at least one uppercase and one lowercase letter.
password.numbers: {{attribute}} must contain at least one number.
password.symbols: {{attribute}} must contain at least one symbol.
password.uncompromised: The given {{attribute}} has appeared in a data leak. Please choose a different {{attribute}}.
